tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Set up authentication flow using JWT. Integrate with frontend login and signup forms.

tasks.title: Design Landing Page
tasks.description: Create the initial wireframe and mockup for the landing page. Focus on responsive design.

tasks.title: Setup Database Schema
tasks.description: Define the data models and relationships for user accounts, tasks, and project metadata.

tasks.title: Develop REST API Endpoints
tasks.description: Build core API endpoints for CRUD operations on tasks and users, including error handling.

tasks.title: Implement Drag-and-Drop in Kanban
tasks.description: Integrate react-beautiful-dnd library to support drag-and-drop functionality across task statuses.

tasks.title: Create Testing Suite for API
tasks.description: Set up automated tests for API endpoints to ensure they meet functional requirements.

tasks.title: Finalize Project Documentation
tasks.description: Complete all documentation, including API specs, database schema, and frontend setup guide.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Set up authentication flow using JWT. Integrate with frontend login and signup forms.

tasks.title: Dashboard and Task Management Basics
tasks.description:
Design the main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation and task summary panels.
Create placeholder components for different sections (e.g., Tasks Overview, Recent Activity)

tasks.title: Phase 2: Dashboard and Task Management
tasks.description:
Define task fields: title, description, start date, end date, status, priority, assigned team/members, etc.
Set up API routes (e.g., POST /tasks, GET /tasks/:id) for CRUD operations on tasks.

tasks.title: Initial Setup and Authentication
tasks.description:
Set up the project structure using create-react-app or Vite with TypeScript (for better type safety).
Initialize a Git repository and configure branches for feature development.

tasks.title: testing
tasks.description: Set up authentication flow using JWT. Integrate with frontend login and signup forms.

tasks.title: Morning Task: Bathing Routine
tasks.description: A refreshing and energizing morning bath to start the day. This routine helps awaken the body, improves circulation, and sets a positive tone for the rest of the day.
